review.author: DevOps + Frontend
findings: P0: enableMode/disableMode lifecycle is clean — mount/unmount organic UI, hide/restore PTY layout, start/stop sessions. Startup path reuses same pattern. No split-brain.

P1: Delivery truthfulness check (result===true || result?.success===true) handles both legacy boolean and new object shapes. Failed state shows reason. Consistent across daemon-handlers, broadcast, targeted send.
P2: sdk-renderer.appendMessage now returns messageId (line 589). sdk-handlers broadcast returns real sdkBridge.broadcast() result instead of hardcoded true.

P3.1: Double-render guard at renderer.js:2003 (if !organicUIInstance) prevents SDK responses from rendering in both organic UI and sdk-renderer. Note: user-input messages at lines 1242/1281 still write to both — acceptable since sdk-renderer containers are invisible when organic UI is mounted.
P3.2: DOM retention cap MAX_MESSAGES_PER_PANE=200 in sdk-renderer.js. Oldest messages removed via while loop. Edge case: worst-case 201 before trim, acceptable.
P4.1-4.4: 3-agent layout correct (2x2 grid, Architect spans top). Bubble UI with avatars, colors, timestamps, slide-in. Responsive at 1200/800/500px breakpoints. Agent SVG icons in colored badges.
P4.5: Stale '4 Claude sessions' replaced with '3 agent sessions' in index.html lines 92 and 98.
PTY mode: No regression — all organic UI code gated behind organicUIInstance/sdkMode checks.
Tests: 130 suites, 3443 tests all passing. organic-ui.test.js covers agent config, state updates, text display, war room messages, visibility, responsive layout structure.
Minor note: AGENT_CONFIG hardcodes 3 agents — if PANE_IDS changes in config.js, organic-ui.js needs manual sync. Acceptable for now.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
